com.storytron.swat.tree

Interface TreeCellRenderer


  • public interface TreeCellRenderer
    Renderer for drawing tree nodes. This is like the TreeCellRenderer for the Tree class.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.awt.Component getComponent() 
      int getHeight(TNode n)
      Used for getting the height of a node without going through all the GUI calls for it.
      java.awt.Component getTreeCellRendererComponent(Tree tree, TNode value, boolean hasFocus) 
      int getWidth(TNode n)
      Used for getting the width of a node without going through all the GUI calls for it.

    • Method Detail

      • getTreeCellRendererComponent

        java.awt.Component getTreeCellRendererComponent(Tree tree,
                                                TNode value,
                                                boolean hasFocus)
        Parameters:
        tree - The tree in which value is stored.
        value - is the node to draw.
        hasFocus - whether the node has focus or not.
        Returns:
        The component which paint method should be called to make the drawing.

      • getHeight

        int getHeight(TNode n)
        Used for getting the height of a node without going through all the GUI calls for it. Must be consistent with the height given for the returned value of getTreeCellRendererComponent(Tree, TNode, boolean).

      • getWidth

        int getWidth(TNode n)
        Used for getting the width of a node without going through all the GUI calls for it. Must be consistent with the width given for the returned value of getTreeCellRendererComponent(Tree, TNode, boolean).

      • getComponent

        java.awt.Component getComponent()
        Returns:
        the component that is to be reused to draw each node.
